meanings.definition: A forecast of a person's future based on the relative positions of the stars and planets at the time of their birth.
meanings.sent1: She always reads her horoscopes in the newspaper.
meanings.sent2: Many people believe in the power of horoscopes to guide them.
meanings.sent3: The horoscopes in the magazine made her laugh with their accuracy.
meanings.sent4: Her obsession with horoscopes was like relying on a crystal ball for answers.
meanings.sent5: The vivid descriptions in the horoscopes stayed in her mind all day.

meanings.definition: A prediction or analysis of a person's character or future based on the positions of celestial bodies.
meanings.sent1: He checked his horoscopes daily to see what the stars had in store for him.
meanings.sent2: The horoscopes in the astrology book were surprisingly accurate.
meanings.sent3: Her friend's horoscopes were always so spot-on, it was almost eerie.
meanings.sent4: The horoscopes seemed to paint a picture of her future with each reading.
meanings.sent5: The horoscopes whispered secrets of the universe to those who believed.
